verses.name: Judges 1:10
verses.text: And Judah went against the Canaanites that dwelt in Hebron: (now the name of Hebron before was Kirjath–arba:) and they slew Sheshai, and Ahiman, and Talmai.

verses.name: Judges 1:11
verses.text: And from thence he went against the inhabitants of Debir: and the name of Debir before was Kirjath–sepher:

verses.name: Judges 1:12
verses.text: And Caleb said, He that smiteth Kirjath–sepher, and taketh it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter to wife.

verses.name: Judges 1:13
verses.text: And Othniel the son of Kenaz, Caleb’s younger brother, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter to wife.
